Uses of Interface
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction

Packages that use TrainableFunction
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
net.tvburger.jdl.cnn
 
net.tvburger.jdl.knn
Provides the implementation of k-Nearest Neighbors
net.tvburger.jdl.linear
 
net.tvburger.jdl.mlp
Implementation of the MultiLayer Perceptron
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars
Defines scalar functions
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer
Contains the generic optimizer related classes
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes
Provides the different regimes for training
net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron
Provides the implementation of Frank Rosenblatt's Perceptron (1958)

    Interface

    interface 
    Optimizer<E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number>
    Defines an optimization algorithm for training an EstimationFunction.
    static interface 
    Optimizer.Stochastic<E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number>
    An Optimizer variant that is restricted to online (sample-by-sample) optimization.
    interface 
    Trainer<E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number>
    Defines a configurable trainer for EstimationFunctions.
    class 
    TrainerImpl<E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number>
    Default implementation of the Trainer interface.
